home.title: Brain Type Test
home.subtitle:
Discover your brain type
with 12 fun questions

q1.text: When making an important decision, you tend to...

options.b: Think logically, but also consider feelings

q2.text: When a friend opens up about a problem, you...

options.a: First empathize and read their emotions
options.b: Comfort them emotionally while offering advice
options.c: Organize the situation and suggest solutions
options.d: Provide objective analysis for the best solution

q3.text: When choosing a movie, what criteria do you use?

options.a: Check critic ratings and award history
options.b: Look at interesting storylines and genres
options.c: Go with the trailer's mood and vibe
options.d: Follow whatever emotion pulls you in the moment

q4.text: When given free time, what do you most want to do?

options.a: Creative activities like drawing, music, writing
options.b: Brainstorm new ideas and imagine possibilities
options.c: Brain games like puzzles and board games
options.d: Organized activities like research and data sorting

q5.text: How do you approach solving a problem?

options.a: Follow established methods and manuals strictly
options.c: Break away from convention and try new things
options.d: Find innovative solutions no one has thought of

q6.text: When you buy a new gadget, you...

options.a: Read the manual carefully and learn all features
options.b: Learn the basics quickly, look up more later
options.c: Press buttons and explore it hands-on
options.d: Use it intuitively and discover new uses

q7.text: When arriving in an unfamiliar city, you...

options.a: Wander wherever your instinct guides you
options.b: Set a rough direction and explore freely
options.c: Observe surroundings and find interesting spots
options.d: Check a map and visit landmarks systematically

q8.text: When forming a first impression, what do you focus on?

options.a: Analyze observable factors like appearance and behavior
options.b: Sense a subtle feeling or energy
options.c: Try to read hidden intentions beyond the surface
options.d: Find patterns in their words and actions

q9.text: When hearing a complex story, you...

options.a: Check and organize every detail carefully
options.b: Grasp the essence and flow intuitively
options.c: Connect it with other related stories
options.d: Picture the big picture first, then fill in details

q10.text: When planning a trip, your style is...

options.a: Plan every schedule and reservation meticulously
options.b: Set a rough framework, keep details flexible
options.c: Just pick a destination and go with the flow
options.d: No plan at all â€” go wherever your feet take you

q11.text: When starting a project, you first...

options.a: Just start and adjust along the way
options.b: Set a rough direction and execute immediately
options.c: Create a step-by-step plan and execute systematically
options.d: Build a detailed roadmap with milestones

q12.text: Your attitude toward tasks with deadlines is...

options.a: Finish early and enjoy the breathing room

strategist.title: The Strategist
strategist.description: You achieve goals through cool analysis and systematic planning. Your decisions are data-driven, and you always have a long-term vision.
strategist.traits: Analytical Thinking, Systematic Planning, Data-Driven, Goal-Oriented

artist.title: The Artist
artist.description: You color the world with rich emotion and boundless imagination. Following intuitive inspiration, you are a free spirit unbound by convention.
artist.traits: Creative Inspiration, Rich Emotions, Free Spirit, Intuitive Expression

scientist.title: The Scientist
scientist.description: You explore the principles of the world through curiosity and logic. Revealing truth through observation and experiment, you enjoy moments of spontaneous discovery.
scientist.traits: Logical Inquiry, Experimental Spirit, Sharp Observation, Truth-Seeking

performer.title: The Performer
performer.description: You captivate people with outstanding empathy and creative vision. While preparing the stage methodically, you electrify the audience with emotional energy.
performer.traits: Charisma, Empathy, Creative Vision, Planned Execution

architect.title: The Architect
architect.description: You systematically design innovation by combining logic and creativity. Your ability to structure new ideas into achievable blueprints is exceptional.
architect.traits: Innovation Design, Structural Thinking, Creative+Logic, Vision Realization

explorer.title: The Explorer
explorer.description: You explore uncharted territory with strong intuition and emotion. With analytical yet spontaneous steps, you discover what others cannot see.
explorer.traits: Intuitive Exploration, Emotional Analysis, Adventurous, Joy of Discovery

manager.title: The Manager
manager.description: You lead organizations with logical intuition and systematic management. Understanding both people and systems, you achieve goals efficiently.
manager.traits: Leadership, Organization, Logical Intuition, Maximum Efficiency

dreamer.title: The Dreamer
dreamer.description: You dream new worlds with boundless imagination and emotion. Gaining inspiration through observation, your spontaneous creations birth original works.
dreamer.traits: Limitless Imagination, Original Perspective, Spontaneous Creation, Emotional Observation

share.label: Share your result!
